content.question: The primary purpose of the passage is to

choices.label: suggest that the domestication of fish and animals may be humanity's most practical plan
challenge humans to cultivate a sustainable relationship with their wild food sources
examine the difficulty of farming enough fish to supplement the wild population
propose rotating the harvest of different species to repopulate the world's supply of fish.

content.answer: challenge humans to cultivate a sustainable relationship with their wild food sources

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify and describe components of the rhetorical situation - the exigence, audience, purpose, context, and message.
